name: Cat Reaper
description:
The game is about a cat, who is the last survivor in Cat-City after a Cat zombie apocalypse. As any cats have 9 lives, but after reducing it the cause of "death", our hero becoming stronger and killing zombie cats even faster! After a live lost, anew one begin!

Controls:
  • W, Space -> Jump
  • A, D -> Movement to left and right
  • Left mouse button - > Fire!
  • Esc button -> Pause the game
